summary: https://variety.com/2019/film/news/avengers-endgame-rerelease-avatar-box-office-record-1203247314/ “If you stay and watch the...
body:
https://variety.com/2019/film/news/avengers-endgame-rerelease-avatar-box-office-record-1203247314/

“If you stay and watch the movie, after the credits, there’ll be a deleted scene, a little tribute, and a few surprises.” - Kevin Feige

*big sigh*

I am less excited about this than they want me to be.

So, full disclosure, I only saw Endgame once and I was actually planning to see it one more time in the next week or two (partially as research for fixit-fic, partially to see if I like it any better after I’ve had time top process the grief of it, and partially because it would be cool for Endgame to beat Avatar’s record). But now, I like…kind of don’t want to? It’s just that now it feels like we’re being manipulated into making the movie beat Avatar’s record and that feels kinda shitty, I guess? Especially after all of the stupid-ass comments from the Russos and Markus & McFeely that make it seem like they don’t care about fans at all, and then to pull this out to make us go see the movie again? Honestly, I wasn’t surprised because it’s a business decision that a lot of people expected, but it still feels manipulative.

But even more so…gosh, I’m expecting that “deleted scene” to be something awful. I mean, it’s not going to be a scene that reveals that Tony Stark is alive and well, and living a secret retirement. If it was, I would forgive everything and happily trot out to the theater multiple times. But it won’t be that.

So barring that, what are the options that would be worth it:

  • if the “tribute” is some kind of tribute to Nat and Tony together
  • a new shawarma scene: it can take place mid-way through Endgame, that’s fine, but a clear homage to that scene with the team laughing and talking and enjoying each others company (because we didn’t get enough of that in Endgame)
  • a bunch of scenes of the Avengers messing around and joking while testing the time travel device (because, again, we didn’t get enough of the team being a team)
  • an afterlife/soul stone scene where Tony sees Yinsen, who tells Tony how proud he is that Tony didn’t waste one second of his life.
  • an afterlife/soul stone scene where Natasha greets Tony and they say, “we won,” before walking off into the orangey sunset together
  • something with Tony and Pepper would be good. Or Tony and Rhodey. But I can’t envision what they would have filmed that would work as a post-credits-scene.

And that’s it. Those are the only good options I can think of that would make this worthwhile to me. That doesn’t mean I won’t go and see it (I probably will, since I was planning to anyway), but… I’m not as optimistic as I would like to be.

summary: Where the Ashes Fall
title: Where the Ashes Fall
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2XXakeN

by DarkKnightArkham

The empty feeling of an impending threat never left after the battle. And Steve would soon learn why, when he stumbled upon a stray katana, snapped in half, and a pool of blood not far away. Turns out the universe thought they hadn’t lost enough, and Tony wasn’t the only sacrifice.

Words: 1922, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: The Avengers (Marvel Movies)
  • Rating: Not Rated
  • Warnings: Graphic Depictions Of Violence, Major Character Death

  • Relationships: Clint Barton & Steve Rogers, Steve Rodgers & Barton Family, Clint Barton/Laura Barton (mentioned), Tony Stark/Pepper Potts (mentioned)

blog.name: argentsallison
blog.title: i love you 3000
blog.description: kristín / 23 / iceland / hufflepuff

tags: also me: it's what we deserve
summary: AA!Tony: Sorry, Cap. I used every suit in the attack on Skull’s base. AA!Steve: Iron or not, you’re still the man! AA!Tony:...
body:
AA!Tony: Sorry, Cap. I used every suit in the attack on Skull’s base.

AA!Steve: Iron or not, you’re still the man!

AA!Tony: ….. sure. I’ll go all billionaire philanthropist on their butts.

AA!Steve: Billionaire genius philanthropist! You’ll think of something. :)

Me: 💕💞💓💗💖💘💝

AA!Steve: Billionaire genius philanthropist! You’ll think of something. :)

blog.name: kaytewren
blog.title: A MARVELous Place
blog.description: Just mainly incorrect Marvel quotes, Marvel headcannons, art and such

summary:
The Iron Family at Disneyland Chapter 3: Nebula and Vision
"So, what is Disney?"
"I've never been here, and I don't know for...
body:
The Iron Family at Disneyland Chapter 3: Nebula and Vision

“So, what is Disney?”

“I’ve never been here, and I don’t know for sure. It seems like an amusement park, but with a talking mouse.” Vision said.

Nebula looked confused.

“Amusement park?”

“An amusement park it a place that is meant for fun. The typical one has rides, games, and food.”

“Hm.” Nebula didn’t think this place would make her have fun, and she decided to not let it.

“Where should we go first?” Nebula asked.

“Let’s try a ride.”

“What should we ride?”

Vision looked at the map.

“Star Tours. That seems interesting.”

“What is it?”

“We will find out.” Vision stated as they walked to the ride.

They arrived, and waited in line. It wasn’t a long wait, and they got there quickly.

Nebula looked around. It seemed like a futuristic theme. Robots and spaceships all around. Fake ones, of course.

They went onto their “ship” and got front-row seats. They put on these special glasses handed out to them before they boarded.

The ride started, and it seemed boring at first. A little blue "droid" as the humans called, was bickering with a tall golded one. Then the excitement happened.

A man dressed in black with heavy breathing and a red glowing sword showed up infront of the screen, saying he was looking for a spy aboard the ship.

A flying droid came up and projected at picture of a passenger on the ship. But, Nebula and Vision soon realized who it was.

It was Nebula.

Now she was interested.

The little blue droid gained control of the ship and flew away from the “bad guys”. The ship tossed and turned as the bad guys were chasing after them, then they went to “lightspeed” and took off.

They were flung back in their seats. Lightspeed was stunning. There was blue all around, swirling in random patterns. 

Then lightspeed stopped and they landed on a desert planet. They crashed inside of a very large and old crashed ship. They were about to be boarded by scavengers when the ship took off. They went to a snow and water planet after that, then went to an unknown part of space and meant up with the “rebels” on their ship.

The ride was over, and Vison turned to Nebula, and to his suprise, she was smiling.

“You liked it?”

Nebula’s took her smile away.

“Yes. It was, enjoyable.”

“Don’t be stubborn. You loved it.”

Nebula glared at him for a while.

“Fine. I did like it.”

They laughed a little. Then they exited the ship. They found themselves walking through a gift shop meant for the ride. Nebula bought a shirt that said “I am the Rebel Spy” and wore it. They both bought a replica of the sword that the one man had, called a lightsaber. Vision had a green one and Nebula had a blue one.

They went to The Haunted Mansion, Buzz Lightyear’s Astro-Blasters, and Autopia before meeting up with Tony and the everyone else at the Mad Tea Party. They both had fun at the ride. They were going slow at first, then Nebula took over and spun them around faster.

They then went to eat at Alien Pizza Planet where they saw Peter and Harley, but they didn’t notice them.

After that they went on the Monorail and Star Tours again before they had to go.

“So, did you have fun?”

Nebula said she wouldn’t let herslf have fun, and couldn’t believe she lost to a park.

“Yes. I had a lot of fun. And you?”

“Yeah. Much less more childish than I thought.”

“Except for all of those kids who ran up to you and called you C-3PO.” Nebula teased.

“We don’t talk about that to anyone but ourselves.”

They started towards the enterance.

-

Thank you 3000 for reading! Next chapter will be on Tony and Morgan.

summary: Which Is Which
title: Which Is Which
body:
by arcstark (QuintessentialNutcase)

Five times Tony flinched, and the one time he didn’t.
Or, in which Steve’s a moron, Tony’s a human dumpster fire, and Bucky just wants everyone to calm the fuck down and talk to each other.

Words: 10821, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Marvel Cinematic Universe
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Tony Stark, Steve Rogers, James “Bucky” Barnes, Natasha Romanov (Marvel), Clint Barton, Thor (Marvel)
  • Relationships: Steve Rogers/Tony Stark
  • Additional Tags: tbh those last three are barely there, Howard Stark’s A+ Parenting, Bucky’s done with their shit, 5+1 Things, Post-Captain America: The Winter Soldier, Post-Avengers: Age of Ultron (Movie), Post-Captain America: Civil War (Movie), not thor: ragnarok compliant, Not Avengers: Infinity War Part 1 (Movie) Compliant, Not Avengers: Endgame (Movie) Compliant, The good old days where everyone lived in the tower an no one turned to dust, PTSD like symptoms, Childhood Trauma, Implied/Referenced Child Abuse, Howard’s an asshat, Not Beta Read, I’m Bad At Tagging, Slow Burn, Tony Stark Has A Heart, Tony Feels, Tony Stark Needs a Hug, Tony-centric, in case you can’t tell I’m something of a fan, Panic Attacks, Flashbacks, tagging is hard

blog.name: natashastarkotp
blog.title: NatashaStark
blog.description:
Trying to keep tonynat alive. Y’all sleeping on a power couple here.

Header made by @kelslk-art

IronWidow focus but ships Tony with pretty much everyone else so expect some other pairings. She/Her.

summary:
Tony: You’re so pretty.
Natasha: And you are so high.
Tony: I think you’re hot too.
Natasha: I said high.
Tony: Hello.
body:
Tony: You’re so pretty.

Natasha: And you are so high.

Tony: I think you’re hot too.

Natasha: I said high.

Tony: Hello.

Tony: Hello.

body:
Rhodey: Look Tones, you’re obviously upset about Stephen.

Bruce: So we’ve decided to come over here and help you out.

Tony: I’m not upset.

Rhodey: We found you in the park throwing rocks at couples.

Tony: WHY SHOULD THEY BE HAPPY?
